website_summaries.verdict: A great overall touring tire with excellent traction and good grip in adverse weather and when taking corners.
pros: Mounting and balancing are no problem, with tires fitting wheels well
Very good traction, especially when cornering
cons: Tires need a few days of breaking in to ensure best traction
Excess tread wear reported on some tires

customer_reviews.title: Over 13k miles tires still look and drive like new
customer_reviews.text: I got these tires because of the price and the reviews were decent. I have since put over 13k miles on them without a rotation (until today) and have zero complaints. They have exceeded my expectations. I drive around 150 miles a day 5 or 6 days a week as well as take long road trips driving 5+ hours at a time. I haven't had a single issue with these tires and would not hesitate to buy again. These tires will last quite a while. They barely show wear and it I'd either over 13k miles. I definately reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: jonboy

customer_reviews.title: They are as good as expensive brands
customer_reviews.text: I have used all expensive brands on my car and these are no less of a tire as far as all season tires go. Very quite ride and easy balance. For the price it's a great deal. I am no tire engineer but I have raced motorcycles etc in my life so I know a thing or two about tires. These are just fine for a daily use. If you need to corner 70mph than go buy performance tires. Your local tire store should install them for 60-70$ and your good.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Demirci

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good wear so far.
customer_reviews.text: bought 2 of these in March , put 16000+ miles on them, down .055" of tread from measured .255 original depth on the front of my 2012 Corolla. Moved those to the back and bought 2 more. They should wear a lot less on the back which should put them at a tread life of I'm guessing at least 40,000 miles. So far they are wearing straight with no balance issues or defects.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Plumlee

customer_reviews.title: Amazon + Dealer + Coupon = Better than Sams club or Costco
customer_reviews.text: Day 1 after installation and alignment. So far so good. Rides nice and quiet in my 2012 Soul +. Excellent traction and does not veer to the left or right so far. Great bargain. Do not forget to sign up with the company directly for your warranty.
customer_reviews.author: uchiapaato

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the value
customer_reviews.text: Great tires for the money. Mounted 4 on a 2004 Acura RSX Type-S. These Westlake tires handle and ride well.
customer_reviews.author: P G

customer_reviews.title: What a Steal!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these tires on for about a month now so only time will tell but from what I see, they are no better or no worse than the "big name tires" that I've purchased in the past for anywhere from $700 to $800 for a set of 4. These do the job just fine and apparently many other people seem to agree. I personally believe this is the best value out there! What a steal if you ask me
customer_reviews.author: Fudgie

customer_reviews.title: Not bad on a budget
customer_reviews.text: I put about 500 miles on them so far. They spin on 20 degree wet roads when pulling into traffic, still spin on warm wet roads but not as bad. They squeak when corning too fast on dry roads. They are pretty loud on the highway. All this leaves me to believe their a harder compound, so they should last longer. I put them on using pry bars and a hammer in my garage. They caught the bead good and hardly even needed balanced. They were one of the cheapest tires I could find is why I bought them. I may spend more on a better tire next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, will continue to drive on them and see how they last. I did pop one a week after purchase, however that was not the tires fault and in fact it held up extremely well considering. I drove over a contractor pac of nails and ended up with about 30 nails in one tire. They still drove 80 miles before going flat. I was able to just add air and make it to a leshwab where they were unable to save the tire due to the 30+ holes. I am very impressed with these tires from that experience.
customer_reviews.author: Brett T Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Best Cheap Tire!
customer_reviews.text: Ok for my frugal shoppers, where money is tight and cars are expensive, these tires right here are a go to! I purchased my car used in January and the tires, which were Goodyear's, that came with the car were illegal in my state with only about 15,000 miles of driving. I do have a lead foot and drive my cars hard, but 15,000 miles is ridiculous. I purchased these on a chance and I have about 5,000 miles in since August when purchased and my Saturn rides smoother than before, handles very well, and have very nice grip in the rain. Haven't had snow yet so waiting totest that, but I'd purchase another set in the future no problem.
customer_reviews.author: jayvon turner

customer_reviews.title: Great tire esp for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these Westlake tires we’ve put on our Hyundai. The first one has worn pretty well, for the money it’s a great tire. I expect them to last at least 3-4 years. The sidewall is pretty thick, not like some Radar or milestar cheap brands. I like the tread pattern too, pretty much the same as the discontinued Michelin Primacy. I used to sell tires at a Sears Auto so I know a bit about tires. Planning on getting two more of these before next winter.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Biswell

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: local tire shops wanted $500 for tires and install. These after install at new small business tire shop cost less than $350. I have had continental, Cooper, falken, and now these. The three prior tires all only lasted about 30k miles. I drive a 2013 dodge dart with 2.0L no turbo manual transmission. I got over 10k miles on these at time of review and they currently seem to be the best tires I have had on car so far. Will update when in need of new set.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah

customer_reviews.title: Good economy tire
customer_reviews.text: I installed a set of these 2.5 years ago and approximately 35k miles ago, and I am getting ready to replace them with another set of the same tires. for the money i'm ok with them only lasting 35k, because to get a 50 or 60k tire i'd be paying double per tire what these cost. Wet performance with these on my V70 is ok, snow is average too.
customer_reviews.author: CFMUSTANG

customer_reviews.title: Quiet Smooth ride.
customer_reviews.text: From the time I left Costco where I had the tires installed I felt like I was riding on a cloud. Now a month and a half later I am still enjoying the ride. It was so quiet and handled very well is the rain. Thankfully I didn't have to drive in any snow this year so I don't know how they would handle that yet. I would definitely purchase these tires again for my Kia Soul.
customer_reviews.author: Tmata

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last very long.
customer_reviews.text: Ran the tires on an 03 Corolla. My Oppinion. Were showing signs of wear with only a few thousand miles on them. Needed replacement with only about 17,000 miles. They would be ok on a car you only use a couple of thousand miles a year.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Super cheap
customer_reviews.text: If you a looking to sell your car or just pass inspection and need new tires these will do. If you want them to transport your family, I would spend a few more dollars. My wet traction while going straight was fine, but trying to turn in the rain the traction levels dropped dramatically. Also these tires squeal while taking highway exits a little fast (when all my other previous tires did not).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but buy at a small risk
customer_reviews.text: The tires are great They were cheap And they arrived fast But within 2 weeks of usage one tire popped and the mechanic couldn't find a screw or anything it was BAM there's a hole
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: VERY NOISY TIRES!
customer_reviews.text: installed 2 of these tires on my 2008 honda civic originally in front, after about 5k miles I noticed they were howling very loud , me being full time auto tech. road forced tires and balanced , both tires had very low roadforce specs yet still noisy , since placed in rear of vehicle and at 10k miles my civic sounds likes it has wooden wheels at freeway speeds , so much in fact the rear view mirror vibrates , replaced with different tires and symptoms disappeared
customer_reviews.author: ann chapman

customer_reviews.title: You can't even buy good used tires for the same price
customer_reviews.text: The tires grip well and are relatively quiet. You can't even buy good used tires for the same price. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steven J Dasta

customer_reviews.title: I use it for fitness
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how it will work for it's original intent, but I use it for fitness. I jump on it, beat it with a sledge hammer stuff like that. It is inexpensive, and It is small enough that I can hide it in my basement when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin Fritterwitz

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: Mounted on a 2012 Mazda3. So far so good. Can't beat the price. Quiet on highway compared to original tires.
customer_reviews.author: D. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Can hear the tires when driving. Had installed at my local shop and rear tire was bad something about the bead being no good. Had to go to a local tire shop and pick up a tire.
customer_reviews.author: Latasha Cofrancesco

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the dollar
customer_reviews.text: This may be too early to review but amazon made it super easy to buy and install. I have to say the ride is smooth and quiet. I tried to buy at the big box and these were cheaper and I had an appointment to get them installed at my local pepboys right across the street from work. Dropped the car off before work and walked back during lunch to pick up the car.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Love 😍 them. So happy and satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be more happy. If you know what the V means the highest speed you can go go. Gave it a speed test going 130 miles per hour. And absolutely awesome. My old tires were H when going 80 it was shaking my sterring wheel. And price is excellent. Good going guys ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Roman Friedrich

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a good tire.
customer_reviews.text: I have these tires on my wife's 2014 mazda3 we got 40,000 miles out of them. They ride smoothly and had the car up to 90 mph, they had a little flex but not bad Good everyday tire in my opinion so I just purchased another set today.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gaither

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Excellent radio for price put these on my wife's Hyundai Elantra and she loves them really smooth on the road I'll keep you in the loop about the mileage looks like it was all even wearing out every time I change the oil I rotate the tires
customer_reviews.author: Zboyz 808

customer_reviews.title: Ordered for 2 cars. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson asked me or order these for his wife’s car. He then recommended them for his cousin’s car so I ordered them for her. She has traveled from Kentucky to Florida with them on her car and she Is pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tires!!!
customer_reviews.text: put these tires on a stock 2011 civic... I can honestly say as I pulled out of the parking lot from the tire shop it was like driving a new car again. The tires ride smooth, steering feels tight and they dont make all that road noise like most budget tires do.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna S.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price range!!
customer_reviews.text: Great tires for the price!! I bought 4 of those for my Hyundai Elantra (2013). In July of 2017. Now they have 33000 miles on it. I probably have 40% thread left, still safe to drive. I only balanced when I installed and rotated every 5000 miles. No problems at all. It’s good a tire for the price range, I paid $35 per tire and I will probably purchase again, I recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Marcio Barreiros de Souza

customer_reviews.title: Defective product lasted 3 month dangerous I would not recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Defective product lasted 3 month dangerous I would not recommend it to anyone. Deflated on the interstate with bumps on the surface every 2 inches around the perimeter of the tire . Dangerous not recommended. AMazon should refund this product.
customer_reviews.author: fadi Debbas

customer_reviews.title: The tires were shipped late. This cost me time and money.
customer_reviews.text: They seem decent, no performance issues so far. However, they were shipped late. This cost me me more than the price of another tire. Hard to know where the issue was, but, makes me hesitate to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: pmen123

customer_reviews.title: ... tires on 2 separate occasions and they have been great. The first purchase was to try and match ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these tires on 2 separate occasions and they have been great. The first purchase was to try and match the same tread pattern on my customers Michelin blow out and they have been very happy with the low priced alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Dean R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Tire
customer_reviews.text: Really great tire, arrived very fast! and I had the local Firestone install the tire on my rim, and balance it. It required almost no counterweight once mounted, which is a good sign.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: After searching many car shops, this was the most affordable option I could find. I included the ship to store and installation which was easy and hassle free. I have had no issues with my tires.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: The noise is horrible
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying value or cheep tires for a while now. As I’m a full time uber lyft driver and I chew threw tires like no tomorrow. I picked these up as I’m not usually overly critical of tires. These have good wet and dry grip. I have yet to try them in snow. There major draw back is the noise! After only 5k miles on them I’m changing them out for a dedicated quiet tire. They are so loud after about an hour of driving I get a headache. Also I drive a 2015 Toyota carolla le
customer_reviews.author: Scott N.

customer_reviews.title: You can’t go wrong with these tires...
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my Nissan Sentra 2016 and they feel good. Recent manufacturing date, good treadwear and looks. I’m expecting to get a good mileage out of them. For what I paid for them, I’m more than happy for what I got...highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Roberto L.

customer_reviews.title: tire was not good in wear or traction on wet surfaces.
customer_reviews.text: i got these when mileage was at 136,705 and now had to replace them at 149,320. Yes i do rotates tire every oil change. I guess these don't last long on AWD Matrix .
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Great Tires
customer_reviews.text: This is the second car I purchased a set of these tires for. In this case I have a 2001 VW New Beetle. As before, this set is great, quiet, smooth, perfect handling. A++++ Good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne M.

customer_reviews.title: Two side bulges on the sidewall on two tires. ...
customer_reviews.text: Two side bulges on the sidewall on two tires. What's up with sidewall on these tires? Now I have to replace another one. P.S. This tire does fit my Volvo S40.
customer_reviews.author: Wife

customer_reviews.title: Good tires
customer_reviews.text: I can't complain, well spent money compare to regular tires . Also, there were a couple huge snow storms in salt lake, and the tires performed above the expectation. They were brand new though
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Nice tires for the money.
customer_reviews.text: These tires arrived 2 days after purchased. Super quick shipping. I was surprised by the initial quality. Tires have rim protection built into sidewall. Mounted and balanced out with no problems as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: b.conover

customer_reviews.title: Superb and cost effective
customer_reviews.text: These tires are great. Felt the difference the minute I drove off from the tire shop. They cost less than the average name tire but quite great and effective for its purpose. Will buy again. Came quickly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Angella Bonnick

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These tires are kind of noisy on the road but they were a great deal so for what I paid I really can’t complain. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MJM

customer_reviews.title: Lower price but a bit noisy the pair I got
customer_reviews.text: Great price and fast shipping! Only thing they are somewhat noisy I had them in front moved to the back so I don't hear as much but otherwise no other complain
customer_reviews.author: Elmer Neris

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with the performance of these tires. They were affordable for the daily commuter vehicle. No frills no nonsense no hassle at an affordable price. Would and will purchase again if and when I need another set for the car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get your money’s worth
customer_reviews.text: I’m a technician and am using this on my car. It’s only been about 3-5 months since putting them on and the threads are still great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Good solid tire
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a 2007 Volvo s40 the old tires were the same exact tire, lasted for 4 seasons and rode great so bought them again. Best bang for the buck, many more expensive tires have a harsh ride quality and wear out quickly. These are great, which is a surprise for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor W

customer_reviews.title: no complaints here
customer_reviews.text: Just as Described. 2 brand new tires great price and mounted with very little weights to balance 2010 honda civic rides great now!!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley S

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Was in a fix for new tires and these were what I could afford. So far so good, I normally get Nokian’s or Firestone’s but these are a good value
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: At this price, this are a great deal. Westlake are good tires will update for durability, noise or anything else. But so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Javier veltor

customer_reviews.title: So far, they work very well.
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting much for the price, but comparing to $140 each for new tires from the dealer, I got 4 tires for a little more than the cost of 1 tire from the dealer. They fit snug on the rims, size was perfect for my car. They don't have a lot of road noise, that is any different than the previous tires that were on my car.
customer_reviews.author: UnboxingProjectDotCom

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Have only put a few thousand miles on these since purchasing and one tire already has a bubble. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rating by by Uber and Lyft drivers...
customer_reviews.text: These tires are well rated for a reason by Uber and Lyft drivers. great price, excellent quality and good millage.
customer_reviews.author: william vanegas

customer_reviews.title: fantastic tires
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of these and put them on my 1994 accord. 6+ months later they are still true, quiet, no wear patterns with regular rotations, and I wouldn't hesitate to purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Davanna Larie Carrigan

customer_reviews.title: They’re new tires and Everything looks good. Will update after I install and run
customer_reviews.text: Tires got here a day early. They’re new tires and Everything looks good. Will update after I install and run, but everything seems good so far!
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Good tire for the price.
customer_reviews.text: They are a very excellent value for the money. I dont know why they want you to rate mileage as this cant be determined until after you have used them up.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Becker

customer_reviews.title: Affordable,  good quality,  convenient
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I thought about purchasing my tires from here, very affordable, good quality (like no other), passengers mention a smooth ride in my vehicle. I'm an uber/Lyft driver they go righ to sleep. I like that.
customer_reviews.author: Jenuine Jewel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tire
customer_reviews.text: Smooth quite ride balanced very nicely, worked well in wet conditions. Great looking tire. Will update on milage when I get there.
customer_reviews.author: chee dizz

customer_reviews.title: solid performers
customer_reviews.text: At this price it's a great tire. have yet to see how the miles go.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great tire for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great price and good set of tires for the money. Quiet smooth ride
customer_reviews.author: Jerry L. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!
customer_reviews.text: Have bought these more than once because they are a great value!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany L

customer_reviews.title: They came in not damaged
customer_reviews.text: It was fast getting here at a very good deal I will keep ordering from them they sell a good brand tires for affordable price amazing
customer_reviews.author: James Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 6 of these tires and very happy with he ride and performance. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Bob W

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be decent tires. Not amazing but they do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Installed on 3 August 2019
customer_reviews.text: So far the tire work good, I have put them to use on the highway. I know it's early but I'm going to put up another review after I have driven on them for a while. For the price I am eager to see what they can do, for the record I am no tire expert.
customer_reviews.author: Jackphin

customer_reviews.title: Tires don't last
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even drive 10,000 miles on these tires before they wore out
customer_reviews.author: Jenny L. Redmon

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat this price !
customer_reviews.text: Decent tire had them on for a month on my Saab 92x. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great tires 10/10
customer_reviews.text: I been using this tired for about 2 week they are super quiet and perfect if u looking for a good quality at low price. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Niguyen D.

customer_reviews.title: So far have it for some months now no problems drives smooth
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend to everyone best deal I ever got and will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna bent

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my car
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my car. Be aware because I wasn't - some mechanics will not install tires on cars when taking off rims. Walmart put them on for a small fee around $28 bucks I think. Still was cheaper than other local quotes I had gotten.
customer_reviews.author: J-d-s

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Good tires at a great price! And since ALL tire MUST pass a DOT standard code they're safe
customer_reviews.author: J Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The tire fit with a little struggle by my tire guy. Not sure why?
customer_reviews.author: malo

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.text: When I received them I was very impressed. I wasn’t sure what to expect since I was ordering them online. When I had them installed and drove on them I was happy with them. They are pretty smooth and have great grip. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hutchens

customer_reviews.title: Good average tires!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good tires, not maybe the best brand but definitely the best thing you get for the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: ABDIEL ROQUE

customer_reviews.title: I HAVE A SET OF THESE TIRES ON MY VW BEETLE AND HAVE 40,000 MILES
customer_reviews.text: THEY ARE VERY GOOD TIRES AND LAST LONGER THEN THE STOCK TIRES DO
customer_reviews.author: Joe S.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The lowest price available in the market and acceptable quality.
customer_reviews.author: reza

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Tires
customer_reviews.text: Cheapest tires I’ve ever purchased!!!!! Got these in a 205/55/16 and they are excellent tires. Quiet on Texas roads. Stay stuck to the road in dry and wet weather. They are of great quality and value.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing hands down!
customer_reviews.text: Best quality for the price. I bought these a couple months ago, I’ve already put around 7000 miles on them and they still look new. Will most definitely order again and highly recommend them. The tire shop I got to put them on couldn’t believe how cheap I got them and how great of a quality they are.
customer_reviews.author: Angel W.

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed with the tire. Only had it about a month and it blew out on the Highway nearly causing an accident. I checked the tire for wear and there was no issues and the tire was at the correct psi. DO NOT BUY EXTREMELY DANGEROUS AND ONLY 1 MONTH RETURN POLICY !!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Josh V.

customer_reviews.title: Good tires if you don't drive in the rain or very often.
customer_reviews.text: They aren't good on wet pavement. I've only had them a couple of months and already have a thumping noise that my mechanic says is caused by a bad tire.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: great tires
customer_reviews.text: ride very smooth, tire shop commented that they were well made
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: cheap tire
customer_reviews.text: thought I would try to save a few bucks with this tire. not worth the savings. it's a cheap tire.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT tires
customer_reviews.text: Rides great!! Compares to expensive name brands! Definitely a great investment. 20$ to mount and balance 2 tires!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a decent tire.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad tire for the price, tire wear doesn't seem excessive. Great deal in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: CT Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a good one haven't used it yet. Using for spare.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Price was great but didn't last too long
customer_reviews.text: Price was great but didn't last too long. I bought them in september 2016 but already need to replace them. Only put about 13-15k miles on them. I thought they were going to last at least 2-3 years. Going to try a different brand for my next set of tires.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Great value. I was hesitant but decided to try them out because of the price and the reviews. Easily saved $100 by buying these tires!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Perez

customer_reviews.title: Tires look good! My driving is usually described as "spirited" and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had them install for over a month now on a 2000 Volvo S70 GLT SE. Tires look good! My driving is usually described as "spirited" and they handle well. I have no complaints about these tires.
customer_reviews.author: Scripter G

customer_reviews.title: The tires are high quality and look good on the car
customer_reviews.text: We were so impressed with how fast these tires arrived, our expected shipping time was 5-8 days and they are in 2 days! The tires are high quality and look good on the car. We have a PT Cruiser and wanted something that would handle rainy roads but also winter roads since we travel. Highly recommend and we saved several hundred by buying all 4 tires online.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Quiet
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy so far. Ride is smooth and the noise level is excellent. I have had no issues with rain. Have not had snow yet but am hoping they go well.
customer_reviews.author: Craig A. Noddin

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: One month in and couldn’t be happier. So cheap, which is perfect for my POS 1999 BMW lol. Haven’t had any issues, let’s see how long they last, if they deteriorate to quickly I’ll try to update this review!
customer_reviews.author: Brett Y.

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2013 Acura ilx
customer_reviews.text: Good inexpensive tires that fit my 2013 Acura ILX. Best of all these tire are around $40
customer_reviews.author: Paulina St.

customer_reviews.title: Race ready
customer_reviews.text: People be like God damn love that tread pattern, what kind of tires you whipping. I be like WESTLAKE'S.
customer_reviews.author: Tk

customer_reviews.title: The ride and handling in weather conditions
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking tire for the money,they only have been on for a month so far very satisfied with how they perform in the rain ,that was a concern for me because it’s my wife’s car ,they ride nice so far so good!!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: The price point concerned me about how they would ride, especially on an all wheel drive vehicle, but surprisingly, the car drives like its brand new with these on.

customer_reviews.text: Feel very nice on my 20-year-old bettle took it up to 95 mph no problem no noise.

customer_reviews.text: Smooth ride and good traction......i mounted these tires myself and lined up the dots on the valve stems and didnt even need to have them balanced.

customer_reviews.author: Rich N.

product_meta.title: Westlake RP18 Touring Radial Tire - 205/55R16 91V
product_meta.description: The Westlake is an all-season touring tire specially designed for drivers seeking year-round performance, enhanced responsiveness, and durability. Known as the best-seller in the Westlake lineup, the RP18 can fit a variety of vehicles including sedans, coupes, minivans, and crossovers. Its smaller range can also fit older vehicles with smaller fitments. The Westlake RP18 features a symmetrical tread pattern which give the tires multiple options for rotation giving it an extended tread life. Its intricate sipping and tread pattern was designed to evacuate water efficiently so you maintain traction even on wet weather. To help with lateral traction while enhancing stability is the vertical sipping pattern. top it off is its all-season touring tread an sipping which deliver all-season performance. The Westlake RP18 is available at T, H, or V-speed rating.
feature_bullets: Westlake rp18 P205/55R16 91V bsw all-season tire
Excellent traction on dry and wet surfaces with a responsive steering response that gives a good feel for the road
Intricate tread pattern and sipping for efficient water evacuation and vertical sipping for sideway traction and enhanced stability
